channel.title: Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator
channel.description: I was curious how the gravity gun is supposed to work in the real world (in a scientific sense) so I looked up Zero Point Energy. I got a few hits, but I still don't know what it's supposed to be and do. Help?:what:

item.title: Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator
item.dc:creator: Hakkuze
item.description:
Hmmm…Well, since the object is not being affected by gravity because of the ZPEF, or any other force, then the device would have to have some way of manipulating the field around the object. This might allow some sort of “pull” effect from the device, perhaps the device’s gravitational pull, or perhaps the device doesn’t actually levitate anything. It may be that the stream of energy from the device, or however it manipulates ZPE, is set to pull the object to a set distance. A kind of hardwired mechanical aspect of the device, which may explain why objects tend to orient themselves when they are picked up.

Read full topic

item.title: Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Hakkuze:

You do realize that you exert a gravitational pull on the Earth, as do all things, because gravity doesn’t work one-way. The earth’s gravity keeps the moon in orbit and the moon’s gravity pulls on earth’s oceans creating the tides.

I like to think that the ZPEFM creates an area of no-state energy. By negating all of the energy affecting an object, then allowing energy to affect it in one direction would mean that ALL forces, such as gravity, would affect it from that direction only.

What that means is use the ZPEFM on the radiator creating a ZPE field around it, then open a hole in the ZPE Field in your direction and the radiator would launch in that direction because forces such as gravity would be directed through the hole. Same principle in reverse, open a hole on the opposite side and the object will be affected by forces in that direction.

Side Note: All this is one big W.A.G. but it makes sense to me.

Thanks. Now to satisfy my curiosity (and to keep the trolls from trolling) how would a ZPEFM make something float in front of the “claw?”

Read full topic

I like to think that the ZPEFM creates an area of no-state energy. By negating all of the energy affecting an object, then allowing energy to affect it in one direction would mean that ALL forces, such as gravity, would affect it from that direction only.

What that means is use the ZPEFM on the radiator creating a ZPE field around it, then open a hole in the ZPE Field in your direction and the radiator would launch in that direction because forces such as gravity would be directed through the hole. Same principle in reverse, open a hole on the opposite side and the object will be affected by forces in that direction.

item.description:
Diabeetus:

https://www.calphysics.org/zpe.html

the section on dark energy says “zero-point energy should gravitate”

however it may not even use gravity, it could just be a name created by logic such as “oh it pulls objects towards it, kind of like how the earth pulls objects towards it using gravity.”

but you never know with something fictional

item.title: Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator
item.dc:creator: Frozen_Cham
item.description:
Burbinator:

you misunderstand

gravity is not a force as in energy, it pulls by nature, which is why there is no reaction

Fucking WRONG.

This -> Potential due to gravity is
U = ∫ F dx
…= ∫ GMm/x² dx
…= GMm ∫ 1/x² dx
…= (-GMmx/x²)|…that g = -GM/x²
…= (gmx)| = mg∆h
so that Potential(or Gravitational) Energy = ∫ GravitationalForce dx = mgh

It’s linked between Energy and Force
All forces were acted by its energy!

Freekheid:

I’m not a physicist, but that’s not correct, is it?
…All forces are created by energy. F=m*a and m=c^2/E, hence Force= c^2 divided by energy (times a). …

So do you, It doesn’t quite right.
Energy that is equal to mc² is NOT the same thing which acting a gravitational force.
This ‘mc²’ is called the ‘rest energy’ isnt it?
And Totall Energy in an instantaneous time is Є = RestEnergy + KineticsEnergy
That is Є = mc² + ½mv² …(for v<<c)

THIS SITUATION WAS STUDIED IN FREE SPACE - CUT ALL FIELD OF ENERGY OFF.

In gravitational field the third term will be added.
Є = mc² + ½mv² + Σmgh

and in case of electric field, the forth will be add, too.
Є = mc² + ½mv² + Σmgh + ΣqEh

and so on for magnetic field or somewhat…

Read full topic

item.title: Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator
item.dc:creator: Freekheid
item.description:
Burbinator:

you misunderstand

gravity is not a force as in energy, it pulls by nature, which is why there is no reaction

I’m not a physicist, but that’s not correct, is it?

I could be wrong but…
E=mc^2, hence all mass is energy and the other way round. The more energy in the smaller the area, the harder the gravitational pull will be. Gravity is a force just like any other. All forces are created by energy. F=m*a and m=c^2/E, hence Force= c^2 divided by energy (times a). And all actions have opposite and equal reactions. Therefore, when I stand on the earth, it will pull me down, but at the same time a force is pointed upward, or else i would be sucked in to the earth itself.

Also, as was quoted before, the gravity gun is not an electro-magnetic field, cause that would indeed not be able to pick up any non-ferro objects. Dunno bout zero energy though.

Read full topic
